title: Vegetable Market - Open or covered ottas for sale of vegetables and / or mutton and fish, along with petty convenience shops and fruit stalls may be permitted
clause_text: Vegetable Market - Open or covered ottas for sale of vegetables and / or mutton and fish, along with petty convenience shops and fruit stalls may be permitted.
section: 4.27 USES PERMISSIBLE IN DEVELOPMENT PLAN RESERVATIONS
